Zotac ZBOX PI330 Intel Atom Portable Mini PC

The Zotac ZBOX PI330 is a highly compact and portable mini PC designed for maximum performance in the smallest form factor possible. This means you can enjoy an extended desktop experience, giving you more screen space to work with and increasing your productivity. The Zotac ZBOX PICO is designed for durable performance, thanks to its fanless cooling solution. full_description:
Zotac MEK MINI Core i5 9th Gen RTX 2060 SUPER 8GB Graphics Gaming Mini PC

The Zotac MEK MINI is a compact and powerful gaming computer, wherever you go. A desktop gaming system that is among the smallest in the world with the power of next-generation hardware. You are under orders from MEK MINI to take charge, react quickly to every move, and push the limits of gaming. Take the MEK MINI and turn the place it is going next into a ready-to-use gaming station.

Strong and Tiny for Game

The Zotac MEK MINI PC MEK MINI is one of the world's smallest desktop gaming systems, measuring just 9.18L. MEK MINI is not only little but also powerful. Utilize the power of next-generation gaming gear to push through. It Gets fast and powerful with the next-generation ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER graphics card, which features real-time Ray Tracing and DLSS with increased AI. Image of a graphics card for illustration purposes only. Leap forward with 6 computing cores at your disposal, whether gaming or experiencing new dimensions. For a fast and dependable connection, use Killer Gigabit Ethernet with Killer AC 1550 (2x2 160 MHz channel/Advanced Stream Detect 2.0). Enable Killer DoubleShot Pro and use both connections. Feel powerful by keeping all 20 web browser tabs active. Take on memory-intensive apps with 16GB of fast, low-power DDR4 memory. Rapid main M.2 NVMe SSD storage allows for quick boot and application load times. An extra high-capacity hard disk stores your gaming collection and more.

SPECTRA 2.0 & 360 VENTILATION

The MEK MINI reveals all of its hues right away. Addressable LEDs are used on the front façade to provide more powerful illumination, fine-tuned colors, and dynamic lighting. With SPECTRA 2.0, you can become your own game system. MEK MINI is meant to be well-ventilated. A strategically located vent for maximum cooling can be seen on either side of the MEK MINI.

Ready to Game

The Zotac MEK MINI is pre-loaded with gaming equipment and is ready to use right now. Game on with a ten-keyless (TKL) LED-lit mechanical gaming keyboard and an LED-lit optical gaming mouse with an adjustable DPI setting for precise mouse control.

Pick up and Go

MEK MINI is a hidden mechanism that will astound everyone who comes upon it. It's very small dimensions and high desktop performance make it ideal for travel and shipment. It's also simple to pick up MEK MINI, put it in a bag or compact box, and change its future location into another ready-to-go gaming station. The Zotac MEK MINI Core i5 9th Gen and RTX 2060 SUPER 8GB Graphics Mini PC comes with a 01-year warranty.

Zotac Magnus One Intel Core i5 10th Gen and RTX 3060 12GB Graphics Gaming Portable PC

The Zotac Magnus One Intel Core i5 10th Gen and RTX 3060 12GB Graphics Gaming Portable PC is a very high tech and sophisticated PC device that is easy to carry and hookup. The Zotac Magnus ONE Mini PC uses top of the line RTX 3060 Graphics Card that has 12GB memory. The Gaming Mini PC has 10th Generation Core i5 processor that is able to perform high end tasks with ease. You can easily fit up to 64GB of DDR4 RAM. All in all, the Zotac Magnus One Intel Core i5 and RTX 3060 12GB Graphics Portable Gaming Mini PC is the perfect solution for those gamers that are always on the move constantly.

Award Winning Design

The MAGNUS ONE is the ultimate ZBOX Mini PC built for hardware enthusiasts. The ultimate performance comes from an Intel- Coreâ€” processor and a ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 30 series graphics card powered by the NVIDIA Ampere architecture. MAGNUS ONE has been designed to be the one system that can be your daily computer, the office workstation, the system for creating, or the system for gaming.

RESPONSIVE PROCESSING

The MAGNUS ONE is more powerful than ever with performance on par with even some desktops many times the size. Equipped with a multi-core Intel's Core processor. expect responsive processing

NEXT-GEN FIDELITY

The ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 30 series desktop graphics card powered by the NVIDIA Ampere architecture pushes the MAGNUS ONE to a whole new level of performance. Experience faster performance over previous-generation GPUs and take in the life-like and smooth visuals with the 2nd generation RT cores and Tensor cores.

SEAMLESS CONNECTIVITY

The MAGNUS ONE delivers a fast and reliable connection on wireless or wired with Killer hardware. Connect wirelessly with the latest WiFi 6, pair devices using the latest Bluetooth 5. or plug into either the fast Killer Gigabit Ethernet or faster 2.5Gbps Ethernet port.

SIMPLE UPGRADEABILITY

The all-new MAGNUS ONE continues the easy upgradeability functionality. Unlock two screws at the rear, and simply remove the top lid and side panels to gain access to the internals to upgrade the SO-DIMM memory, Optane Memory. M.2 SSD. or 2.5" HDD/SSD.

INTEGRATED POWER

The MAGNUS ONE includes an internal 500W 80+ Platinum power supply. Among power supplies, Platinum is the highest rated option for its effective power use efficiency.
